import _objectSpread from"/home/brandonzpb/Documents/projects/custom/creatures-of-habit/creatures-frontend/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/dashboard/user';// CREATE user
var createUser=function createUser(userObject){var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/create"),userObject);return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// LOGIN
var login=function login(type,credentials){var reqUser={password:credentials.password,type:type};type==='username'?reqUser.username=credentials.username:reqUser.email=credentials.email;var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/login"),reqUser);return req.then(function(res){console.log('res',res.data);return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// POST reset request
var postResetRequest=function postResetRequest(email){var reqUser={email:email};var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/reset"),reqUser);return req.then(function(res){console.log('res',res.data);return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// GET reset code (POST email)
var getResetCode=function getResetCode(email){var reqUser={email:email};var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/reset_code_email"),reqUser);return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// POST reset code
var postResetCode=function postResetCode(code,token){var reqUser={reset_code:code};var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/reset_code"),reqUser,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// PUT password resest
var putPasswordReset=function putPasswordReset(userObject,token){var req=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/reset_password"),userObject,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){console.log('res.data',res.data);return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// GET all users
var getAll=function getAll(token){var req=axios.get('/dashboard/users',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// READ user
var readUser=function readUser(userId,token){var req=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(userId),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){console.log(res.data);return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// GET USERNAMES
var checkUsername=function checkUsername(type,input,userObject,token){// returns if request is available
var thisUser;type==='username'?thisUser=_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},userObject),{},{username:input,type:'username'}):thisUser=_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},userObject),{},{email:input,type:'email'});var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/usernames"),thisUser,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){console.log('res',res.data);return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// POST localStorage creatures
var storeLocalCreatures=function storeLocalCreatures(userId,creatures,token){var req=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(userId),creatures,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// UPDATE user
var updateUser=function updateUser(){var type=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'none';var userId=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var userObject=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;var token=arguments.length>3?arguments[3]:undefined;var thisUser=_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},userObject),{},{type:type});var req=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(userId,"/update"),thisUser,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};// DELETE user
var deleteUser=function deleteUser(userId,token){var req=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(userId),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return req.then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};export default{getAll:getAll,createUser:createUser,login:login,postResetRequest:postResetRequest,getResetCode:getResetCode,postResetCode:postResetCode,putPasswordReset:putPasswordReset,readUser:readUser,checkUsername:checkUsername,storeLocalCreatures:storeLocalCreatures,updateUser:updateUser,deleteUser:deleteUser};
